comments:
Description:
NPE when insert and click inserted group in Outline

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report
2. Insert a table
3. Insert a group from Outline
4. Click the inserted group in Outline

Result:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredSelection.equals(StructuredSelection.java:111)

In some rare case, a null added to the selection list. That causes this problem. Remove null from selection list
